揟字的基本解释

揟
xū
〔揟次〕古县名，在今中国甘肃省。
滤水。

揟
jū
　ㄐㄩˉ
取鱼。

揟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xū］
［《廣韻》相居切，平魚，心。］
揟次，古县名。汉置，属武威郡。北周废。见《嘉庆一统志·涼州府一》。

揟字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　揟； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页443第03
【唐韻】相居切【集韻】新於切，?音胥。【說文】取水沮也。或作?。　又揟次，縣名。【前漢·地理志】武威郡揟次縣。　又【集韻】子余切，音苴。義同。一曰取魚也。

揟字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
揟字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
xū
〔菟次〕The name of the ancient county in present-day Gansu Province, China.
Filter water.
Squeeze

ㄐ ㄩˉ

Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xū］
["Guangyun" Xiangju, flat fish, heart. ]
The name of the ancient county. Hanzhi, belongs to Wuwei County. The Northern Zhou Dynasty wasted. See "Jiaqing Yitongzhi·Liangzhou Mansion One".
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　揟; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 443 03
[Tang Yun] Xiangjuqie 【Jiyun】New Yuqie,? Yinxu. [Said the text] Ju also take water. Or for?.　 Then again, the county name. [Former Han Geography] Shuci County, Wuwei County.　[Jiyun] Zi co-cut, sound Ju. The same meaning. One said to fetch fish.
